column5: Hello  Over the recent month I have noticed that my Atlantic Class survival suit is starting to get really dirty from lying on the ice and fishing in general.  I was wondering if there was a cleaning solution or cleaning instructions that is needed to be followed..  Any help is appreciated  Dave
MILD SOAP AND WARM WATER NO MACHINE AND HANG TO DRY
I like to rub Perch and Walleye slime all over mine... gives it that just caught feeling! HH
Mine says right on it HAND WASH ONLY, Air Dry   Gerritt.
Mine smells like a football locker room, I let the slime build up to much, time for a wash.  Nice tips Clampet.
